post:
So you needed a NAT in Australia? A KVM based one supporting custom ISO. 

Announcing new location: Sydney, Australia 🇦🇺 at Equinix SY4
Looking Glass: http://syd.lg.webhorizon.in/

<br>

**KVM NAT VPS Australia**  🇦🇺 

> * IPv6 subnet + NAT IPv4 connectivity, up to 100 ports. 
> * **Support for Domain Forwarding** - means you can have your domain served on port 80 & 443. SSL support lets encrypt certificates.   :) 
> * **Support VNC access**
> * **Full support** for Docker, Wireguard, OpenVPN etc.
> * Custom ISO
<br>


**KVM-NAT-256MB** (Sydney, Australia)

* 1 CPU Core(s) (fair share)
* 256MB RAM + 128MB swap
* 5GB NVMe/SSD disk space
* /80 IPv6 + NAT IPv4
* KVM Virtualization
* 250GB  transfer @1Gbps per month

[**Order Now**](https://my.webhorizon.in/order/config/index/kvm-ipv6/?group_id=45&pricing_id=459&coupon=WeLoveOz)  - USD $8 yearly - special pricing

====Please turn OFF VPN/PROXY while ordering===
Coupon - WeLoveOz

> See all KVM NAT Plans > https://my.webhorizon.in/order/main/packages/kvm-ipv6/?group_id=45
